12:26 <vmassol> preparing for GSOC 2016? :)  
12:31 <Enygma`> vmassol: was about to send a mail  
12:32 <Enygma`> yesterday started the org application period  
12:32 <Enygma`> will ask on the list if we are interested in participating  
12:32 <Enygma`> and who is interested  
12:38 <vmassol> k  
12:38 <vmassol> thx  
12:59 <Enygma`> GSoC 2016 Org Application Period started yesterday. Committers willing to mentor a student this summer please reply to the mail on the devs list: http://xwiki.markmail.org/thread/rsoadu7y2urwurk2
